item.description: A perfect storm of challenges for the European automobile industry shows no sign of letting up, analysts say.

item.title: Michael Saylor's case for Microsoft buying bitcoin gets rejected by shareholders
item.description: Microsoft investors voted against a proposal to consider diversifying the company's balance sheet by purchasing bitcoin.

item.title: Insurance stocks have fallen since UnitedHealthcare CEO killing
item.description: Major insurance stocks have fallen since their closing prices last Tuesday, the day before the deadly shooting of UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson.

item.title: Luigi Mangione rages about 'insult' to American people, challenges UnitedHealthcare murder extradition

item.title: Trump promises 'fully expedited' permits for investors of $1 billion-plus in U.S.
item.description: The Truth Social post signals Trump's aim to deregulate federal agencies, undo Biden-era environmental rules, and attract foreign investment.
